name: [Untitled Fantasy Project]
description:
[Untitled Fantasy Project] is an interactive fiction/visual novel game, created in Ren'py. You play as a wandering monster hunter in a post-war fantasy setting. Decide your name, pronouns, and personality; make choices, interact with a variety of characters, and unearth a deadly conspiracy.

It's in demo form, and will be updated over time. Playable on PC or Mac.

Currently Features:

- Hand-painted character art and backgrounds.

- Some words. Hand-typed, fully organic, free-range.
